name: LOCKERBOUND
description:
This is the playable demo for our game, LOCKERBOUND.

There is no set win condition. However, if you manage to get to the end and then find and defeat the pink skeleton you can declare yourself the champion of the demo. On that same note, if you question why there is blood coming from the skeletons you are declared the loser of the demo.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D - move forward/left/backwards/right
  • Q - shoot grapple hook to surface in range
  • Spacebar - dash upwards
  • Spacebar + WASD - dash in direction you are moving
  • Mouse 1 - primary attack
  • Mouse 2 - secondary attack

Feedback survey:
